The following gladiator poll is now closed.  Here are the 
final results: 


POLL QUESTION: What do you propose we call the new 
class of characters who share abilities 
of two different classes. 

CHOICES AND RESULTS
- halfings, 0 votes, 0.00%  
- half-breeds, 0 votes, 0.00%  
- dual class, 4 votes, 30.77%  
- multi class, 3 votes, 23.08%  
- hybrids, 5 votes, 38.46%  
- mon (mistakes of nature), 1 votes, 7.69%  
- other, 0 votes, 0.00%
